import React from "react"; export default function Projects() { const projects = [ { name: "Portfolio Website", desc: "A personal portfolio in React with Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion animations" }, { name: "Food Online Delivery System", desc: "React + Node.js + MongoDB full stack app with payment integration" }, { name: "Task Manager", desc: "MERN stack application for managing daily tasks with real-time updates" }, { name: "Travelling and Tourism", desc: " MERN app with API integration for Travelling " }, { name: "Blog Platform", desc: "Full-stack blogging platform with user authentication and rich text editor" }, { name: "Student Management System ", desc: "Build in Springboot where we manage " }, ]; return (

Projects

{projects.map((p, i) => (

{p.name}

{p.desc}

Live Demo
))}
); }
